external_games.name: Don't Take it Personally, I Just Don't Like You: The Camping Trip
Don't Take It Personally, I Just Don't Like You: The Camping Trip

name: Don't Take it Personally, I Just Don't Like You: The Camping Trip
summary: Don't Take it Personally, I Just Don't Like You is a lo-fi relationship dramedy about camping illegally on government property in the chill of early autumn, having public anxiety attacks in crowded shopping malls, the people we choose to be with, and what we do when they don't choose us back. In this demo, you'll be introduced to several characters and locations from the full game (including two romanceable characters!) in a fully self-contained, hour-long story.
